channel.title: Chapter 8: Epilogue on From Draenor With Love
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 8: Epilogue on From Draenor With Love

item.title: Reflections, Part Four
item.description: Five years ago, I thought of a joke that made me laugh. I turned the joke into a single comic featuring my character Vidyala and the character of my friend Rades (aka Mike). I sent it to him to see if he thought it was funny, and whether he might like to do more comics with me. After a lot of brainstorming (especially to come up with the name), From Draenor With Love was born.

item.title: Reflections, Part Three
item.description: And now, Four and Wrathionâ€™s epilogues. We thought about it long and hard, and we really felt Four deserved a happy ending, living happily ever after in Ogriâ€™la. Wrathion, on the other handâ€¦well, heâ€™s got some thinking to do. From Draenor With Love wraps up next week, see you then!

item.title: Reflections, Part One
item.description: Bet you didnâ€™t expect to see Garroshâ€™s ugly mug again, huh? You didnâ€™t think Iâ€™d wrap up our story without making Vid draw her favorite orc one last time, did you?? If you donâ€™t remember what Taran Zhu is referring to, it goes all the way back to the Patch 5.4: Siege of Orgrimmar trailer. Remember, the events of FDWL started when Siege of Orgrimmar began. And now, we examine the aftermath â€” of both stories.
